jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
At the heart of Gojek’s businesses, we move things around. Whether that’s people, food, packages, fresh groceries, etc. Moving things around boils down to understanding the best route, understanding traffic, and understanding locations. The Cartography team is an internal team that surfaces mapping technologies needed by all internal product teams within Gojek. Examples of teams we support are GoRide, GoCar, GoFood, GoSend, GoShop, and GoPay.

The Cartography team is an internal mapping team that is looking for an experienced Product Manager to lead our efforts around routing and ETAs. This is a new stream and so you will be driving the strategy, defining the right metrics, and delivering a high quality, performant solution. You enjoy building scalable, performant systems that drive business impact.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Drive product strategy and execute on the prioritized roadmap for your product area
  • Lead a cross-functional team, partnering with engineering, data science, analysts and other teams to ship major features and product improvements
  • Define, track and report on key product, business and customer metrics
  • Seek product ideas and feedback, gather requirements, write specs, create wireframes and workflows
  • Define clear and well-scoped requirements documents that are easily understood by technical and non-technical audiences
  • Work closely with our data science and geospatial analyst team to identify problems and opportunities
  • Collaborate with internal stakeholders in customer support, driver ops, and business to develop launch strategy, product messaging and training

• BA/BS degree or equivalent practical experience
  • 3-6 years of experience working as a product manager, ideally working on a platform team and/or large-scale products
  • Independent and curious, you set your targets, ask for help when you need it and are always looking to learn something new
  • You’re entrepreneurial and are comfortable working in a complex and face-paced environment
  • Analytical and data-driven, you love digging into the data to understand what’s happening and define & measure success on every project
  • You have experience and enjoy managing internal teams who are our customers
  • You have experience leading agile product development teams and are always looking for ways to help them be more effective
  • You’re fluent in English and are a confident communicator
  • Experience as a software engineer/developer and working with distributed teams are highly desired
